20110121142057.000|20110121142059.000|TR0|its kind.
20110121142059.000|20110121142102.000|TR0|
20110121142102.000|20110121142104.000|TR0|Federal and local authorities handcuffed 
20110121142104.000|20110121142106.000|TR0|suspects in New York, New Jersey, Rhode 
20110121142106.000|20110121142108.000|TR0|Island, and Florida.  They targeted 
20110121142108.000|20110121142111.000|TR0|alleged members from the five largest 
20110121142111.000|20110121142113.000|TR0|organized crime families.  You can see 
20110121142113.000|20110121142115.000|TR0|some of them, there, in handcuffs.  Some 
20110121142115.000|20110121142118.000|TR0|of the families including the Gambinos and 
20110121142118.000|20110121142120.000|TR0|the entire leadership of the Colombos.  
20110121142120.000|20110121142122.000|TR0|Charges include murder, extortion, and 
20110121142122.000|20110121142124.000|TR0|drug trafficking.

20110121143115.000|20110121143118.000|TR0|that point when they're getting to -- out 
20110121143118.000|20110121143120.000|TR0|of the crib and into the bed.  And he 
20110121143120.000|20110121143122.000|TR0|says, at that point, the kids need to know

20110121143647.000|20110121143650.000|TR0|homes just recently -- well, why did it 
20110121143650.000|20110121143652.000|TR0|happen?  The bank screwed up.
20110121143652.000|20110121143654.000|TR0|
20110121143654.000|20110121143657.000|TR0|The Servicemembers' Civil Relief Act 
20110121143657.000|20110121143659.000|TR0|limits mortgage interest rates to six 
20110121143659.000|20110121143701.000|TR0|percent, and according to media reports, 
20110121143701.000|20110121143703.000|TR0|JP Morgan Chase exceeded that and has now 
20110121143703.000|20110121143706.000|TR0|has admitted to overcharging more than 
20110121143706.000|20110121143708.000|TR0|4,000 troops for their home loans.
20110121143708.000|20110121143710.000|TR0|
20110121143710.000|20110121143713.000|TR0|Julia Rowles and her Marine husband, 
20110121143713.000|20110121143715.000|TR0|Captain Jonathan Rowles nearly lot their 
20110121143715.000|20110121143717.000|TR0|home in this mess. Captain Rowles is an 
20110121143717.000|20110121143720.000|TR0|F-18 fighter pilot, and he served as a 
20110121143720.000|20110121143722.000|TR0|Marine for five years in the western 
20110121143722.000|20110121143724.000|TR0|Pacific.  He is now stationed in South 
20110121143724.000|20110121143726.000|TR0|Carolina.  The Rowles say the bank took 
20110121143726.000|20110121143729.000|TR0|months to fix that error, overcharging 
20110121143729.000|20110121143731.000|TR0|them by as much as $900 a month.  But it 
20110121143731.000|20110121143733.000|TR0|didn't end there.
20110121143733.000|20110121143736.000|TR0|
20110121143736.000|20110121143738.000|TR0|Julia Rowles joins us with her lawyer, 
20110121143738.000|20110121143740.000|TR0|Bill Harvey.  So, Julia, the bank tells 
20110121143740.000|20110121143742.000|TR0|you they would fix this problem and the 
20110121143742.000|20110121143745.000|TR0|next thing you knew, you had collections 
20110121143745.000|20110121143747.000|TR0|calling you?
20110121143747.000|20110121143749.000|TR0|
20110121143749.000|20110121143752.000|TR0|JULIA ROWLES, SUING JP MORGAN CHASE FOR 
20110121143752.000|20110121143754.000|TR0|FORECLOSUERE:  Yes.  It took even years 
20110121143754.000|20110121143756.000|TR0|for them to say they were going to correct 
20110121143756.000|20110121143758.000|TR0|it, and nothing was ever corrected.  Every 
20110121143758.000|20110121143801.000|TR0|three months, we were supposed to 
20110121143801.000|20110121143803.000|TR0|recertify our SCRA standing, which we did. 
20110121143803.000|20110121143805.000|TR0| Every month, they would tell us it would 
20110121143805.000|20110121143808.000|TR0|be fixed next month, it's going to be 
20110121143808.000|20110121143810.000|TR0|fixed next month.  And eventually, about 
20110121143810.000|20110121143812.000|TR0|two years ago, the collection calls 
20110121143812.000|20110121143814.000|TR0|started coming in.  From there on, every 
20110121143814.000|20110121143817.000|TR0|day, twice a day, we would get collection 
20110121143817.000|20110121143819.000|TR0|calls saying we owed well more than we 
20110121143819.000|20110121143821.000|TR0|even owed.
20110121143821.000|20110121143824.000|TR0|

20110121143831.000|20110121143833.000|TR0|ROWLES: We tried to deal with it on our

20110121144025.000|20110121144027.000|TR0|April.  However, we spent years trying to 
20110121144027.000|20110121144030.000|TR0|fix this before seeking legal help, and

20110121144032.000|20110121144034.000|TR0|statement to us does not even begin to

20110121144053.000|20110121144055.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  Yes. Go ahead, Bill.
20110121144055.000|20110121144057.000|TR0|
20110121144057.000|20110121144059.000|TR0|HARVEY:  Kyra, anybody who has ever been 
20110121144059.000|20110121144102.000|TR0|caught taking money wants to give it back, 
20110121144102.000|20110121144104.000|TR0|say I'm sorry, and cry no harm, no foul. 
20110121144104.000|20110121144106.000|TR0|That's what is happening here.  
20110121144106.000|20110121144109.000|TR0|Unfortunately, the law does not allow that 
20110121144109.000|20110121144111.000|TR0|to happen.  We're dealing with emotional 
20110121144111.000|20110121144113.000|TR0|stress, emotional damage that occurs when 
20110121144113.000|20110121144115.000|TR0|these men and women are around the world 
20110121144115.000|20110121144118.000|TR0|in trenches, fighting for our freedom. And 
20110121144118.000|20110121144120.000|TR0|that is what the SCRA is designed to 
20110121144120.000|20110121144122.000|TR0|prevent.
20110121144122.000|20110121144125.000|TR0|
20110121144125.000|20110121144127.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  And that is a point well made.  
20110121144127.000|20110121144129.000|TR0|I mean, Julia, your husband is an F-18 
20110121144129.000|20110121144131.000|TR0|pilot.  You had to stress enough about,
